name: Lennuabi Many GEOs
description:
Lennuabi is a flight compensation company that is dedicated to assisting passengers in fighting for their rights against airlines. The company offers a user-friendly platform to help passengers claim compensation for delayed, cancelled, or overbooked flights, ensuring that they receive what they are rightfully owed under Regulation (EC) No 261/2004. The platform allows users to easily check their eligibility for compensation and submit a claim, with the potential to receive a compensation.

Comprehensive Compensation Support: Lennuabi's services cover a wide range of flight disruptions, including delays, cancellations, and overbooking, offering passengers a hassle-free way to claim compensation they are entitled to.

Effortless Claim Submission: The platform simplifies the compensation process, allowing passengers to submit their claims quickly and easily. With a risk-free, "no win, no fee" policy, passengers only pay a service fee after they have received their compensation.

Customer Testimonials: Lennuabi boasts a growing base of satisfied customers who have successfully received compensation for their flight disruptions. The platform has facilitated the collection of over €1,000,000 in compensations, with the amount continuing to grow.

Legal Expertise and Support: Lennuabi represents passengers in legal matters related to flight compensation, ensuring that their rights are upheld and that they receive fair and just compensation for their travel inconveniences
